title: Ballot Box Information
description: Regroups the information of a ballot box.

name.description: The name of the ballot box.

verificationCardSetId.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the verification card set. Corresponds to vcs in the specification.

isTest.description: True if the ballot box is used for testing, false otherwise

countICH.description: The count of swiss resident voters.

countACH.description: The count of swiss abroad voters.
